title: G5 - Top/Jg/Mid looking for Duo partner for S8
body:
Hey All,

Im currently sitting on G5 (not planning on pushing) and still play ranked games and norms but really looking
for a long term Duo partner  to finish out S7 and to play together through the lay off till S8 to continue on wards.
Have had my many games with afks and feeders annnnnnd tbh Im done with that shit. 

I mainly play top ({{champion:31}} {{champion:24}} {{champion:75}} {{champion:17}} ) and jg ({{champion:11}} and just started learning {{champion:79}} will also be learning{{champion:113}}  )
can also mid ({{champion:74}} {{champion:157}} {{champion:42}}do want to learn{{champion:3}}  )

TLDR - ISO Duo partner from now pushing into season 8 looking for mid to high plat if not diamond.

Cheers Chocco (IGN - Dr Clarence)
